name: The Three Musketeers - D'Artagnan & the 12 Jewels
description: Join d’Artagnan in his quest! Travel around ancient France, swordfight with your enemies, foil Richelieu's plans, serve the Queen and, at long last, become a musketeer!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 Mo DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 150 MB available space
